lines.text: let c , s be characters with s = a
let ans be a integer with ans = 0
ans is equal to ans + minimum of absolute ( c - s ) , 26 - absolute ( c - s )
lines.code: ans += min ( abs ( c - s ) , 26 - abs ( c - s ) ) ;
